label: 東域伝燈目録
対訳語: Catalog of the Transmission of the Torch to the East
本: The Weaving of Mantra:  Kūkai and the Construction of Esoteric Buddhist Discourse . Columbia University Press . 1999
見出し読み: とういきでんとうもくろく
見出し読み_mod: とういきでんとうもくろく
説明文: A bibliographical catalog of works composed by Nara Buddhists prepared in 1094 by Eichō (1014-?), a priest of Kōfukuji in Nara, one of the strongholds of the Hossō school (p. 100). [永超、興福寺、法相]
